# SCNSceneSourceAssetUnitNameKey

**Global Variable**

The name of the unit used in the scene file.

## Declaration

```swift
let SCNSceneSourceAssetUnitNameKey: String
```

## Discussion

The value for this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString] object.

## Constants

- **SCNSceneSourceAssetUnitMeterKey**: The conversion factor from the unit used in the scene file to the SI meter.
